channel.title: Skillcape emotes
channel.description:
I'm trying to add skillcape emotes, but when I click the skillcape emote button, it freezes the client. Here's the error I get in my client's command prompt:
[code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1656 at client.method101(client.java:8083) at client.method96(client.java:7835) at client.method114(client.java:9121) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3122) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2275) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4700) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]

item.title: Skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

I’m trying to add skillcape emotes, but when I click the skillcape emote button, it freezes the client. Here’s the error I get in my client’s command prompt:

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1656
        at client.method101(client.java:8083)
        at client.method96(client.java:7835)
        at client.method114(client.java:9121)
        at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3122)
        at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2275)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101)
        at client.run(client.java:4700)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
